Key Arguments: The legislation restricts freedom of speech and access to information.
Social media serves as a platform for truth and independent analysis, countering government misinformation.
The bill is seen as a step towards a totalitarian state, akin to Orwellian or fascist regimes.
Government has historically spread misinformation and disinformation, leading to negative consequences.
Independent media is crucial for uncovering truths that mainstream media and government narratives suppress.
Notable Quotes: Social media has been a voice for truth, & has to date largely prevented attempts of government to make bad laws to further restrict our freedoms.
This bill is a step towards an Orwellian type fascist government that controls people by controlling the truth.
I can only say that this is one of the most evil bills that I have ever seen concocted by the Australian government.
